thank you so much !

Serious question. If someone, who knows what they're talking about, could suggest to me a video format conversion utility that can convert files uploaded by FoV into ones that my WDTV Live media player can play that would be very much appreciated. It hasn't previously had any problems with Mp4 x264 or not, MKV, AVI, damn near anything. It only seems to have an issue with FoV uploads. 
currently New Tricks and Doctor Who are for me, unplayable.
The software I have tried to do the conversion with, S.U.P.E.R. and RER HD both make a playable file but at least double the file size.
Thanks in advance for any useful suggestions.
evilg0d, try using either Handbrake or Pazera.
thx :)
Thanks trace535. I'll give them a go.

Yeah, to actually add to the convo a bit instead of just bitching about assholes like I did earlier haha:
the two utilities trace535 posted work great. I've used handbrake before to some success, but it seems like, for me at least (and a lot of people I've seen comment on it), Pazera is the winner of the two. Always seems to work well, and consistently. Prob hard to go wrong with either one though. Also, hey, after you convert it you might upload it here to Pirate Bay, because apparently according to BUTT_SEX (I love typing that out in serious convo, haha), it's a highly in-demand thing that NO ONE can live without!

Also, one final tip: If you've downloaded a file in .mp4 but are having trouble playing it on a specific device, a quick fix is to try renaming the format to .avi rather than .mp4, sometimes this will allow the device to unpack it in a way that allows playback. Not sure exactly why it works, but it will (on occasion, not for every file).
Many thanks trace535. Handbrake worked a treat.
